p: And in Minneapolis, a progressive, prosperous mid‐Western city – ‘Minnesota nice’; home state of Eugene McCarthy, Hubert Humphrey, and Walter Mondale; Prince, and Garrison Keillor – this was not Lake Woebegone. America has no excuses now; the video images will forever float around in the cloud to remind us lest we forget again, or perhaps see for the first time, what a long nightmare it has been for African Americans, especially African American men.
